import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Remove tag from ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/tags/{tagId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes a specific tag from a ticket, updating its categorization. Tags help organize and filter tickets; removing a tag updates search results and any tag-based automation rules.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to locate the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **tagId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/tags](/docs/api/tags/search-tags-by-type) to list available tags, or [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to see tags currently on the ticket.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `Items[].TicketId`
2. View current tags: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) → review `Tags[]` array
3. Remove tag: [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags/\{tagId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-tag)
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm tag removal

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags/\{tagId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-tag) – Add a tag
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-tags) – Bulk update all tags

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"tagId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the tag to remove","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
